attributes.review: I downloaded this app because a person said trump 2020 and when I did an orange popped on my screen it was so ugly and disgusting my grandma said she went BLIND, then she heard him speak later while he was throwing a tantrum and speaking nothing but stupidity and she went straight up DEAF. Do not get this app if you love your grandma or your brain. I do not recommend this TO NOBODY. Also since oranges started popping up everywhere on my phone I had to RESET MY PHONE AND THE UGLY ORANGE WAS STILL THERE. I fixed it by deleting the app 1,000/10 do not recommend.
attributes.title: To Much Orange

attributes.review: I gave this one star because who would give it five
attributes.title: Trump can’t take down tik tok follow me @christina_rosas

attributes.review:
this app is HORRIBLE like I mean HORRIBLE like first 
It took weeks to download second 
After getting this app  my phone started crashing and glitching I tried everything to make it stop but it wouldn’t so  I tried going to the Apple Store to try to see what’s going on but the Apple store couldn’t find anything that could be causing this situation.So then after I started sinking about how my phone doesn’t glitch until I downloaded this app so I deleted the app and after about a couple days my phone became normal so at first I was a little bit skeptical so I re-downloaded the app and the same thing happened again but not only it started a VIRUS on my phone like for real I’m not being overdramatic like it literally started a VIRUS  on my phone.
But if you’re thinking about getting this App  don’t because the same thing could possibly happen to you. If you don’t believe me that’s fine but just don’t download the app and if you do just be prepared I’m not saying this to scare you it’s just a warning.Stay safe
attributes.title: A TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and opened it, what I saw was so disgusting, there were pictures of piles of poop in toilets🤮🤮and I saw this horrific and disgusting 🍊that kept saying all these weird and dumb things. After I closed the app weird things started happening, it got worst to the point that ugly🍊 possessed my tv🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮. Once I deleted the app, nasty🍊 and other disgusting images stopped popping up. I am so glad I deleted the app.😌😌😌😌
